Bajaj-Finance-welcome-en.wav.text: Dear Customer this is Disha from Bajaj Finance, Can you spare two minutes of your time

previousConversation-en.wav.text: As per our previous conversation I would like to inform you that your EMI Rs. 1000 is still overdue and request you to pay immediately. How would you make the payment? by Online or bajaj branch

Bajaj-Finance-paymentMethod-en.wav.text: please confirm through which channel will you pay. PayTM, googlepay, mobikwik, phonepay or NB

confirmationThankYouNew-en.wav.text: thankyou for the confirmation. Have you received the payment link

thankyouNew-en.wav.text: please use the link to make the payment today. Have a great day.

registeredMobileNo-en.wav.text: you will receive payment link on your registered mobile number. Please  ensure you make the payment today.Have a great day

thankyou-en.wav.text: thankyou for the confirmation. Have a great day

paymentLink-en.wav.text: Its very important to make the payment for you to maintain a healthy credit score and avoid further penalty charges. We will send you a link which will help you to make the payment have a great day.

sorry-en.wav.text: Response repeating again and again. Please wait while we transfer the call to live agent.
